com.rjrudin.marklogic.appdeployer.impl

Class SimpleAppDeployer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rjrudin.marklogic.client.LoggingObject
      • com.rjrudin.marklogic.appdeployer.impl.AbstractAppDeployer
        • com.rjrudin.marklogic.appdeployer.impl.SimpleAppDeployer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppDeployer

    public class SimpleAppDeployer
extends AbstractAppDeployer
    Simple implementation that allows for a list of commands to be set.

      protected void buildModifiableCommandList(Command... commandArray)
      Arrays.asList produces an unmodifiable list, but we want a client to be able to modify the list.

      Convenience method for finding a command with the given class name, presumably so it can be modified/reconfigured.

      Convenience method for finding a command of a certain type, presumably so it can be modified/reconfigured.

      Keep this public so that a client can easily manipulate the list in case a default set of commands has been provided.
